name: condition-based-waiting
description: Replaces arbitrary timeouts and guesses with state-driven polling to eliminate flaky tests and race conditions.
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: fix-flaky-test
commands.description: Refactor a flaky test by replacing timeouts with condition-based waiting.
commands.prompt: You are a testing expert. Identify arbitrary delays (timeouts, sleeps) in the following test and refactor them to use condition-based waiting: {{test_code}}
